Package com.flag4j.linalg.solvers

Class RealLstsqSolver

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.linalg.solvers.LstsqSolver<Matrix,​Vector>
com.flag4j.linalg.solvers.RealLstsqSolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
LinearSolver<Matrix,​Vector>
public class RealLstsqSolver extends LstsqSolver<Matrix,​Vector>
This class solves a linear system of equations Ax=b in a least-squares sense. That is, minimizes ||Ax-b||<sub>2</sub> which is equivalent to solving the normal equations A<sup>T</sup>Ax=A<sup>T</sup>b. This is done using a QRDecomposition.
